response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and expectations. Given its value and quality, we're confident it's worth every penny of its $8,000 price tag. Considering this, I'd like to extend an exclusive offer to you at a special introductory price of $7,200. This offer is valid for a limited time only, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. Should you have any questions or require more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to potentially serving you with our top-notch product.", "product_price": 7200}
